nationality.description: Country of origin as stated by the defendant, as per CJS Standards section 3.103

additionalNationality.description: Additional country of origin as stated by the defendant, as per CJS Standards section 3.103

gender.description: See CJS Standards (3.45)Mandatory if defendant is a person.Otherwise field must be null, e.g., organisation. 0=Not Known1=Male2=Female9=Not specified
